member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.BaseEntity
member.summary: Base class for all entities in the system

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.BaseEntity.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the entity

member.summary: Date and time when the entity was created

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.BaseEntity.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the entity was last updated

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event
member.summary: Represents an event in the WitchCityRope system Business Rules: - Events have capacity limits - Events support sliding scale pricing - Events must have at least one organizer

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.Capacity
member.summary: Maximum number of attendees allowed

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.RSVPs
member.summary: Free RSVPs for social events

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.PricingTiers
member.summary: Sliding scale pricing tiers for the event

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.Sessions
member.summary: Sessions within this event

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.TicketTypes
member.summary: Ticket types available for this event

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.GetConfirmedRegistrationCount
member.summary: Gets the number of confirmed registrations (ticket purchases)

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.GetConfirmedRSVPCount
member.summary: Gets the number of confirmed RSVPs (free attendees)

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.GetTotalConfirmedAttendees
member.summary: Gets the total number of confirmed attendees (registrations + RSVPs)

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.GetAvailableSpots
member.summary: Gets the number of available spots considering both registrations and RSVPs

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.HasAvailableCapacity
member.summary: Checks if the event has available capacity for both registrations and RSVPs

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.AllowsRSVP
member.summary: Checks if RSVPs are allowed for this event (Social events only)

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.RequiresTicketPurchase
member.summary: Checks if ticket purchases are required (Classes/Workshops) or optional (Social events)

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.Publish
member.summary: Publishes the event, making it visible for registration

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.Unpublish
member.summary: Unpublishes the event

member.summary: Updates event details

member.summary: Updates event dates

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.UpdateCapacity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates event capacity

member.summary: Adds an organizer to the event

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.RemoveOrganizer(WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.User)
member.summary: Removes an organizer from the event

member.summary: Updates pricing tiers for sliding scale

member.summary: Adds a session to the event

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.RemoveSession(WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession)
member.summary: Removes a session from the event

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.AddTicketType(WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventTicketType)
member.summary: Adds a ticket type to the event

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event.RemoveTicketType(WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventTicketType)
member.summary: Removes a ticket type from the event

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession
member.summary: Represents a session within an event (e.g., S1, S2, S3) Business Rules: - Session identifier must be unique per event (not globally unique) - Start time must be before end time - Capacity must be greater than 0 - Cannot delete sessions with existing registrations

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.#ctor(WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new event session
member.param: The event this session belongs to

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.Event
member.summary: Reference to the parent event

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.SessionIdentifier
member.summary: Session identifier unique per event (S1, S2, S3, etc.)

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.Name
member.summary: Display name of the session

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.StartDateTime
member.summary: Session start time (stored as UTC)

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.EndDateTime
member.summary: Session end time (stored as UTC)

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.Capacity
member.summary: Maximum capacity for this session

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.IsActive
member.summary: Whether this session is active

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.TicketTypeInclusions
member.summary: Ticket types that include this session

member.summary: Updates session details

member.summary: Deactivates the session (soft delete)

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventSession.Activate
member.summary: Reactivates the session

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventTicketType
member.summary: Represents a ticket type for an event with pricing and session inclusions Business Rules: - Min price must be >= 0 - Max price must be >= min price - Quantity available must be > 0 or null (unlimited) - Cannot delete ticket types with existing registrations - Must include at least one session per ticket type

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.EventTicketType.#ctor(WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Event,System.String,WitchCityRope.Core.Enums.TicketTypeEnum,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Creates a new event ticket type
member.param: The event this ticket type belongs to
Display name of the ticket type
End of sales period (null for no limit)

member.summary: Junction entity representing which sessions are included in a ticket type Business Rules: - Ticket type and session must belong to the same event - Cannot create circular references - Unique combination of ticket type and session

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.IncidentAction
member.summary: Represents an action taken in response to an incident

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.IncidentReport
member.summary: Represents an incident report for safety and community management Business Rules: - Reports can be anonymous - Reports are confidential and encrypted - Multiple moderators review each report - Follow-up actions are tracked

member.summary: Encrypted description of the incident

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.IncidentReport.ReferenceNumber
member.summary: Reference number for tracking the incident

member.summary: Adds a review from a moderator

member.summary: Updates the severity of the incident

member.summary: Assigns the incident to a user for handling

member.summary: Represents a moderator's review of an incident report

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Payment
member.summary: Represents a payment transaction in the system Business Rules: - Payments support sliding scale pricing - Refunds are allowed within the cancellation window - Payment details are encrypted for security

member.summary: The amount paid (from sliding scale pricing)

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Payment.TransactionId

member.summary: Checks if the payment is eligible for refund

member.summary: Gets the net amount after any refunds

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Registration
member.summary: Represents a user's registration for an event Business Rules: - Registrations can be cancelled 48-72 hours before event (configurable per event) - Registration requires payment to be confirmed - Users can select from sliding scale pricing

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Registration.EventTicketTypeId
member.summary: Optional reference to the ticket type used for this registration

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.Registration.EventTicketType
member.summary: The ticket type used for this registration (nullable for legacy registrations)

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.RSVP
member.summary: Represents a free RSVP for social events in the WitchCityRope system Business Rules: - RSVPs are only allowed for Social events (EventType.Social) - Classes/Workshops require ticket purchase instead of RSVPs - Users can RSVP for free and optionally purchase tickets later to support the event - RSVP confirmation codes use format: RSVP-XXXXXXXX

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.RSVP.Status
member.summary: Current status of the RSVP

member.summary: Timestamp when the RSVP was last updated

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.RSVP.CheckedInAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the attendee was checked in to the event

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.RSVP.CheckedInBy
member.summary: ID of the staff member who performed the check-in

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.RSVP.CancelledAt

member.name: P:WitchCityRope.Core.Entities.RSVP.CancellationReason

member.summary: Cancels the RSVP

member.summary: Updates emergency contact information

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.ValueObjects.EmailAddress
member.summary: Represents a valid email address Business Rules: - Must be a valid email format - Case-insensitive for comparison - Used for user communication and authentication

member.name: M:WitchCityRope.Core.ValueObjects.EmailAddress.TryCreate(System.String,WitchCityRope.Core.ValueObjects.EmailAddress@)
member.summary: Tries to create an EmailAddress from a string

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.ValueObjects.Money
member.summary: Represents a monetary value with currency Business Rules: - Supports sliding scale pricing - Amount must be non-negative for prices - Currency code must be valid ISO 4217

member.name: T:WitchCityRope.Core.ValueObjects.SceneName
member.summary: Represents a scene name used within the community Business Rules: - Scene names must be between 2 and 50 characters - Scene names cannot contain offensive content - Scene names are case-insensitive for uniqueness
